title: Burn
description: Just when Velaney thinks she is safe again…her worst nightmare comes back to haunt her.  Eric is dealing with his own insecurities as he tries to accept Velaney’s decision to help the enemy…can he get past it? Will they be there for each other in the end?  Eric struggles to step aside and trust Velaney...but will his past keep him from doing so? Can he let go in order to move forward?  Velaney and Eric had their fair share of ups and downs in SPARK…their love was undeniable and intense. Just when you think they could get their happily ever after…pasts collide and merge together…will they fight for what they want?  Or will their love crash and burn?
author: Brooke Cumberland
